description: Georgia is quite the business hub. A slew of companies including Coca-Cola and The Home Depot call it home, but what’s the largest firm headquartered here?
title: This is the largest company headquartered in Georgia
title_page: This is the largest company headquartered in Georgia
text:
Georgia is quite the business hub. A slew of companies including Coca-Cola and Delta Air Lines call it home, but what’s the largest firm headquartered in the Peach State?
»RELATED: AJC Top workplaces in Atlanta 2017
To find the answer, Business Insider got a little help from relocation service CapRelo, using its data to determine the number of employees worldwide from each corporation in the U.S.
The package delivery company has more than 434,000 workers and services more than 220 countries. On a daily basis, it delivers 19.1 million packages and documents globally, according to its online fact sheet.
With a 2016 revenue of $61 billion, it’s no wonder UPS is “one of the leading providers of specialized transportation and logistics services.”
Interested in the results for the rest of America? Take a look at Business Insider’s map below.
